contextId.information: Yahweh is speaking about his own voice.  AT: "my voice" (See:  [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_123person]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])
contextId.quote: the voice of Yahweh your God

contextId.information: Yahweh is speaking about himself. AT: "But I will" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_123person]])
